passive.name: DETERMINATION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DETERMINATION
                                Every third attack deals an additional 15 physical damage (22% (+2% ) ) and heals for 13 (7 (+4,5 ) + 10%  + 40% ).

q.name: (Q) THREE TALON STRIKE
q.description:
(Q) THREE TALON STRIKE
 9/8/7/6s   30 
                                
                                
                                Empowers the next three attacks to deal an additional 20 physical damage (20/28/36/44 + 40% bonus ) and reduce the cooldown of other abilities by 1 second.The third attack knocks the target up for 0.75 seconds.

w.name: (W) WIND BECOMES LIGHTNING
w.description:
(W) WIND BECOMES LIGHTNING
 12/10,5/9/7,5s   45 
                                
                                
                                Slashes his spear, dealing 71 physical damage (40/50/60/70 + 50% ) and slowing by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Xin Zhao then thrusts his spear, dealing 90 physical damage (40/85/130/175 + 75% ) and slowing by 50% for 1.5 seconds.The furthest enemy champion hit is Challenged for 3 seconds, increasing Audacious Charge's cast range at them.Attack Speed reduces cast time.Deals 50% damage to minions.

e.name: (E) AUDACIOUS CHARGE
e.description:
(E) AUDACIOUS CHARGE
 11s   50 
                                
                                
                                Dashes to an enemy, dealing 55 magic damage (55/90/125/160 + 80% ) to all nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 0.5 second. Xin Zhao gains 45/52.5/60/67.5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.This ability's cast range is increased against a Challenged target.
notes: range is increased against a Challenged target

r.name: (R) CRESCENT GUARD
r.description:
(R) CRESCENT GUARD
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Passive: The last champion hit by an attack or Audacious Charge is now Challenged.Active: Sweeps his spear, dealing physical damage equal to 75 (75/150/225 + 100% bonus  + 80% ) plus 15% of enemies' maximum Health and knocking them back except the Challenged one. For the next 5 seconds, Xin Zhao blocks damage from enemies far away.Deals 600 max damage against monsters.
